title: My Personality: Insecure, Nervous, and Cowardly

text_block_list.text: She darted to escape and before I knew it I was chasing after her. Her form the other day was good… I just felt that I couldn't ignore her.
choice_data_list: Wait!
Wait!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
choice_data_list: I'll listen if you have any problems.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Why… Why are you doing this—
choice_data_list: It's because I can sense your talent.
It's because I can sense your talent.

text_block_list.text: I told her that hearing her say things like "I can't do it" and seeing her lack of self-confidence made me worry about her.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: But what talent do I have!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Ever since the beginning, I-I've never been good at anything! 
…Me getting in here was nothing more than a fluke, so that's why—
choice_data_list: First, you have a good starting dash

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Huh.
I've somehow stopped her self-deprecation. Even though I've only seen her run once… I started listing off all of her good traits.
choice_data_list: Your stamina and positioning is great.

text_block_list.text: That is to say, I think she can avoid getting surrounded by other racers, or even needing to run on the outside.
choice_data_list: You're attentive of your surroundings

text_block_list.text: In a race, the smallest mistake can decide the outcome later on, so keeping a cool head can give you a huge advantage.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
T-there's no way that— 
I don't——
choice_data_list: You are a talented uma musume.
You are a talented uma musume.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Wha…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Thank you… Very much…
…I tried to do my best to make her understand, but I don't think she understood how serious I was.
choice_data_list: (She has no self-confidence at all.)

text_block_list.text: I don't know why she's so insecure. Has she always been like this? Is this due to her failing to win in her races?
In any case, I wonder if her unrestrained form the other day was from this "high level of insecurity."
If I leave her alone like this, she might end up quitting from the academy altogether. After seeing what she can do, that'd be a huge waste. Then I should—
choice_data_list: Care to join me for some training?
Care to join me for some training?

text_block_list.text: If I get to know her better, then I can make a training menu suited for her. And if she starts to get some victories, then surely she'll become more confident.
I can make her believe that she has a talent for racing.
choice_data_list: I'll make you stronger.
I'll make you stronger.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …You'll make me—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…But what if I don't get stronger? 
What if I only just waste their time——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
( …! No, I can't think like that! 
Wasn't I just thinking that I should keep moving forward?!?)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Take a good look at this opportunity. 
If I want to get stronger— If I want to keep running!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: P-please help me!
And that was how I ended up having a provisional contract with Cheval Grand. I'd be overlooking her training for a short while.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah! …Tch, Haaaaaah!!!!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(First, I need to improve my form! 
Then I need to choose a running style that can fit my body perfectly!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, hah! Not yet!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Now I have to strengthen my lower body… I need to have a stronger explosive dash so I could have even the smallest advantage on the final straight.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (They said… that my strong point was my stamina, so I need to refine it even more!
choice_data_list: Alright, one more time!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: O-okay!
Some time has passed since I've started training Cheval.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Phew… 
U-um… How did I do?
choice_data_list: Good! You cleared the set time, nice!
Good! You cleared the set time, nice!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Uwah! Amazing, in such a short amount of time too!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…It's all because you've been overlooking my training. 
Thank you very much, really…
choice_data_list: …I'm not sure if that's the case.

text_block_list.text: Simply said, I did nothing more than give her information. The one who really achieved her goals was—
choice_data_list: It's all thanks to your great attitude.
It's all thanks to your great attitude.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: M-my attitude?
While I was training her, I gained a better understanding of what type of uma musume she was.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
So this is a list of my strengths and weaknesses… 
…I see, I think I get it…
For her to follow the instructions of a trainer she just met with no questions, she'd have to be a very honest and straightforward girl.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
U-um, excuse me… 
I have a few questions about the stretches you taught me.
Not missing the fine details, she's got a very straightforward personality.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
1 2 3 4…2 2 3 4. 
Phew… alright, I've got to get warmed up first.
She's certainly a hard worker. She even asked me permission to do additional training on her own.
All because Cheval Grand is such an honest, earnest hardworker.
choice_data_list: You've gotten much stronger!
You've gotten much stronger!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
……Y-you're exaggerating a bit there. 
After all, I'm insecure, nervous… and cowardly.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: So that's why… I'll believe in anything that you say, since you're an expert… I check everything, no matter how small. And I'm anxious about my self training.
choice_data_list: I mean, you're an honest hard worker.
I mean, you're an honest hard worker.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Hwah, That's—
Putting aside her racing talent, it's not easy to change her natural temperament. And that's exactly why her natural temperament is valuable.
choice_data_list: There aren't many that are like you
There aren't many that are like you

text_block_list.text:
I wanted to convey my enthusiasm to her by meeting her eyes. 
I managed to lock gazes with those blue gems for a moment, before—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Eh. 
…I-I'm sorry.
Completely bewildered, she ran away.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …My face is so… hot.
(…They're not just praising my running, but my personality too.)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand

text_block_list.text: (More importantly— In their eyes… was me)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …It's a strange feeling. Very strange.
